definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pass over, through, by, pass on (NH = BH; Zinj. [[עבר]] Haph. Lzb:336 Cook:88, perh. also Nab. [[עבר]] Id:ib.; Targum [[עֲבַר]], Syr. 9bar id.; As. ebêru, id. Dl:HWB 10, and deriv.; Ar. 9abara id., and deriv.; Sab. [[עבר]] = Heb. [[עִבַּר]]
Mordt:Sab Denkm 49; [[עברת]] passage, march through DHM:ZMG xxix (1875), 614 also bank or neighbourhood of a stream SabDenkm:49);—
pass over:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: = cross (stream, wady, sea, etc.), (1) c. acc. Ge 31:21 (E), Ge 32:11 (J), Jos 3:14, Jos 3:17, Jos 4:1 (all JE), De 2:14 (D), Nu 32:29 (P), 2Sa 17:20, 2Sa 17:22, 2Sa 17:24, Is 16:8, + 37 t., + Ge 32:23 (E; acc. [[מַעֲבַר]]), [[וְעָֽבְרָה הָֽעֲבָרָה לַעֲבִיר]] 2Sa 19:19 (rd. [[וַיַּעַבְרוּ]] We Dr Kit Löhr, and they crossed the ford, or [[וְעָֽבְרוּ]] frequent., HPS; > LXX Klo Bu [[וַיַּעַבְדוּ הָעֲבׂדָה]] and they performed the service); also c. acc. + acc. loc. 1Sa 13:7, + [[ה]] loc. De 4:26, De 31:13, De 32:47. (2) acc. om. Ju Jdg 3:28, 2Sa 17:16, 2Sa 17:16 + 32 t., + [[עׂבֵר]] Ju Jdg 8:4 (rd. [[וַיַּעֲבׂר]] Vrss, or del. as gloss GFM Bu), 2Sa 15:23 a (where rd. [[עׂמֵד]] for MT [[עׂבֵר]] We Dr Bu Kit Löhr HPS, but del. [[עׂבְרִים]], plausibly, Klo HPS); c. [[אֶל־]] † Nu 32:7 (JE), De 27:2 (D), Jos 4:13, Jos 22:19 (both P), c. [[אֶל־עֵבֶר]] De 30:13, c. [[הָעֵבֶר]] 1Sa 26:13; c. [[ה]] loc. † De 3:21, De 4:14, De 6:1, De 11:8, De 11:11, De 34:4, Is 23:6; c. acc. loc. † Is 23:12, Je 2:10, Nu 32:32 (P). †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: cross border, boundary, c. acc. Nu 20:17 b, Nu 21:22 b (both JE), + [[אֶל־]] 1Sa 27:2; of invasion, acc. om., c. [[אֶל־]] Ju Jdg 11:32, Jdg 12:3, 1Sa 14:1, 1Sa 14:6, 1Sa 14:8, c. [[ה]] loc. 2Ki 8:21, abs. 2Ch 21:9.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: cross over (sc. intervening space) against ([[עַל־]]) 1Sa 14:4, unto 2Sa 24:20 (rd. [[אֶל־]] for [[עַל־]] Bu HPS, cf. LXXL), so perh. also Is 45:14 ([[עַל]]; rd. [[אֶל]] ?); c. acc. of goal Am 5:5, Am 6:2. †

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: pass, march over (sc. bodies of captives), Is 51:23, Is 51:23. †

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: = overflow, fig., Is 23:10, abs. of invasion (like a flood) Is 8:8, hence Da 11:10, Da 11:40, Na 1:8 (cf.

definitions.title: 4 c
definitions.body: ); of evil thoughts Ps 73:7; cf. [[עָֽבְרוּ דִבְרֵי־רָָע]] Je 5:28 they overflow with evil matters. †

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: pass, go, over, of waves, over one's head, usu. c. [[עַל־]] Is 54:9, Ps 42:8, Ps 88:17, Ps 124:4, Ps 124:5 (all fig.), Jon 2:4; c. acc. Ps 38:5, cf. Je 23:9 over whom wine hath gone (= overcome with wine). †

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: of razor passing over head, c. [[עַל]] Nu 6:50; fig. of time passing over one, c. [[עַל־]] 1Ch 29:30 (cf. BAram. [[חלף על]] Da 4:13 +). †

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: pass over upon ([[עַל־]]), in weakened sense, nearly = come or light upon; of spirit Nu 5:14, Nu 5:14, Nu 5:30; abs. + [[מֵאֵת]] 1Ki 22:24 = 2Ch 18:23; c. [[עַל־]] also light upon in chastisement or judgment, Ho 10:11, Job 13:13, cf. Na 3:19; De 24:5 no affair shall pass over upon ([[עַל־]]) him, i.e. no duty be laid upon him. †

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: overstep, transgress, c. acc. of covenant, command, etc. (usu. divine); Nu 14:41, Jos 7:11, Jos 7:15 (all JE), De 17:2, De 26:13, Jos 23:16 (all D), Ju Jdg 2:20, 1Sa 15:24, Ho 6:7, Ho 8:1, 2Ki 18:12, Je 34:18, Is 24:5, Ps 148:6, 2Ch 24:20, Da 9:11; command of earthly king Es 3:3; abs. Ps 17:3. †

definitions.title: j.
definitions.body: pass over = overlook, forgive [[עַל־פֶּשַׁע]] Mic 7:18 (+ [[לְ]] pers.), Pr 19:11; c. [[לְ]] pers. only, Am 7:8, Am 8:2. †

Pass beyond, c. acc. 1Sa 14:23 (of battle), Je 5:22, Je 5:22 (of sea); + [[אֶל]] Ge 31:52, Ge 31:52 (E); pass a little beyond [[מְעַט מֵהָראׁשׁ]] ´[[ע]] 2Sa 16:1, [[כִּמְעַט]] [[שֶׁעָבַרְתִּי מֵהֶם]] Ct So 3:4; c. acc. of God's command ([[פֶּה]]), Pr 8:29 (of sea), Nu 22:18 = Nu 24:13 (JE); acc. om. Job 14:5 Ps 104:9.
Pass through, traverse, usu.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: c. [[בְּ]] of land, city, etc.: Nu 22:21 (E), Nu 20:21, Jos 18:9 (JE), Ex 12:2 (P), 1Sa 9:4, 1Sa 9:4, 1Sa 9:4, 1Sa 9:4, 2Sa 20:14 (+ [[ה]] loc.), + 31 t.; c. [[בְּתוֹךְ]] † Ez Eze 9:4, Job 15:19; c. [[בְּקֶרֶב]] of camp, nation(s) † Jos 1:11, Jos 3:2 (D), Jos 24:17 (E), Am 5:17, De 29:15; c. acc. † De 2:18, De 29:15, Ju Jdg 11:29, Jdg 11:29, Is 10:29, Job 14:5; abs. Ex 12:23 (J), Nu 20:19, Nu 20:20 (JE), De 2:28, Mic 5:7, La 3:44, Ez Eze 14:15, Eze 33:28; † opp. [[שׁוּב]], pass through and return, go to and fro, Ex 32:27 (E; ´[[מִשַּׁעַר לָשַׁעַר בְּ]]), pt. abs. those going to and fro Ez Eze 35:7, Zec 7:14, Zec 9:8. †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: c. [[בְּ]] of river 2Sa 19:19 + 2Sa 15:23 (but rd. [[עׂמֵד]] We Dr Bu al.), of sea Zec 10:11, cf. Is 43:2, Ps 66:6, c. [[בְּתוֹךְ]] Nu 33:8 (P), Ne 9:11; c. [[בְּ]] of gates Is 62:10, Is 62:10; cf. [[עׂבְרֵי]] [[בְּעֵמֶק]] Ps 84:7 (Ges:§ 130 a).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: pt. abs. [[הָעׂבְרִים]] the passers-through Ez Eze 39:11 a, rd. prob. [[הָעֲבָרִים]] (JDMich Hi Co Berthol), v:Eze 39:11 b (Co rds. [[אֶת־הַגַּיְא]]; Toy del. as gloss), v:Eze 39:14 (del. LXX SyrVer Co Toy Berthol). †

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: pass through between ([[בֵּין]]) parts of victim, in covenant Ge 15:7 (J), Je 34:18, Je 34:19.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: traverse c. acc. of expanse of water Is 33:21 (of ship).

definitions.title: 4. a.
definitions.body: pass along by ([[עַל־]]), Ge 18:5 (J; not [[סַרְתֶּם אֶל־]] Ball after LXX), 1Ki 9:8, Je 18:16 + 14 t.; c. [[עַל־פָּנׇיו]] † Ex 34:6 (J); c. acc. † Ge 32:32, Ju Jdg 3:26 (on other possibilities v. GFM), 2Ki 6:9; abs. pass by Ex 33:22, Ex 33:22 (J), 2Ki 4:8 + 15 t., + (of wind) Job 37:21, Pr 10:25 and (of waters, = flow past) Hb Hab 3:10 (cf. Job 6:15), Job 11:16, hence [[מוֹר עׂבֵר]] Ct So 5:5, So 5:13 flowing myrrh (liquid, opp. hard = [[דְּרוֹר]] ´[[מ]] Ex 30:23); pt. = passer-by Mic 2:8, Ez Eze 5:14, Eze 36:34, Eze 39:15 + 6 t. (Pr 26:10 v. Toy), + [[עׂבֵר אׂרַח]] Is 33:8, [[עׂבְרֵי דֶרֶךְ]] † La 1:12, La 2:15, Job 21:29, Pr 9:15, Ps 80:13, Ps 89:42; pass by = overtake and pass c. acc. † 2Sa 18:23.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: pass by, [[בְּ]] rei, Ps 103:16 (of wind).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: sweep by, of scourge (fig.) Is 28:15, Is 28:18, Is 28:19 (cf. [[מַעֲבָר]]

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: be past, over, of time, etc., Am 8:5, 1Ki 18:29, Ge 50:4, Ct So 2:11 + 7 t.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: pass along (from hand to hand), only pt. [[שֶׁקֶל כֶּסֶף עׂבֵר לַסּׂחֵר]] Ge 23:16 i.e. current money of the merchant (or, money passing over to merchant ? Bu:Th Lz 1892 (3), 63); [[כֶּסֶף עׂבֵר]] 2Ki 12:5.
Pass on, go on:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: abs. Ge 18:5 (J), Nu 22:26 (E), Ju Jdg 12:1 + 20 t., + Ju Jdg 11:29, Jdg 18:13, Jos 10:29 (D; all c. acc. of goal + [[מִן]]), Ge 18:3 (J; c. [[מֵעַל]] pers.); also c. [[אֶל־]] pers. vel rei, proceed unto 1Ki 19:19, 2Ki 4:8, Ne 2:14, c. [[עַל־]] pers. (rd. [[אֶל־]] ?) La 4:21; c. [[מִן]] Ru 2:8, out of the city 2Sa 15:24; c. [[ה]] loc. Ju Jdg 12:1, 2Sa 19:41, c. [[ה]] loc. + [[מִן]] Jos 10:31, Jos 10:34 (D); [[מֵעִיר בארץ]] ´[[ע]] 2Ch 30:10; abs. 2Sa 19:41 all the people of Judah proceeding with the king (rd. [[עׂבְרִים]] for [[ויעברו]], v.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: specif. of boundary-line, pass on, c. [[ה]] loc. Nu 34:4, Nu 34:4, Jos 15:3, Jos 15:4, Jos 16:6 (om. [[אוֹתוֹ]] LXX Vulgate cf. Benn: Hpt Steuern); + [[מִן]] Jos 19:13 + [[מִן]] + [[אֶל־]] Jos 18:13; c. [[מִן]] + [[לְ]] Jos 15:6; c. [[אֶל־]] Jos 15:7, Jos 15:10, Jos 16:2, Jos 18:18, Jos 18:19; c. acc. loc. Jos 15:3, Jos 15:10, Jos 15:11 (all P, exc. Jos 16:2 JE).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: c. [[לִפְנֵי]] pass on before, go in advance of Ge 32:l7, Ex 17:5 (both E), Ge 32:22, Ge 33:3, Ge 33:14 (all J), De 9:3 + 7 t., + De 3:18, De 3:28, De 31:3, De 31:3, Jos 1:14 (all D) where ref. may be to crossing in advance of; c. [[עַל־פְּנֵי]] 2Sa 15:18 so v:2Sa 15:23 b (reading [[עַל־פָּנָיו]] LXXL We Dr Klo Bu Kit HPS). †

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: pass on as far as ([[עַד]]), Ju Jdg 19:12, + [[מִן]] v:Jdg 19:18; c. [[אַחֲרֵי]] after 2Sa 20:13; [[תַּעֲבָר־כּוֹס עַל]] La 4:21 pass on unto (cf. [[תִּסּוֹב]] Hb Hab 2:16). †

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: pass on into ([[בְּ]]), Jos 3:11 ( + [[לִפְנֵי]]), Jos 4:7 (both JE), cf. Ju Jdg 9:26, Job 33:28, so also ´[[בִּבְרִית י]] De 29:11 enter into a covenant with ´[[י]]; (Klo rds. ´[[וַיַּעֲכׂר בַּבּ]] also 2Ki 23:3 for MT [[ויעמד]]). †

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: pass on away from ([[מֵאֵת]]) De 2:8 ( + [[ה]] loc.). †

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: pass on in order, for counting 2Sa 2:15, [[עַל־יְדֵי מוֹנֶה]] Je 33:l3, [[עׂבֵר עַל־הַפְּקֻדִים]] Ex 30:13, Ex 30:14, Ex 38:26, also pass on under ([[תַּחַת]]) rod Le 27:32 (for counting; all P; cf.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: pass along, travel c. acc. of way Is 35:8 cf. Is 51:10; [[אָרְחוֹת יַמִּים עׂבֵר]] Ps 8:9; c. [[בְּ]] of way Jos 3:4, Pr 4:15, Pr 7:8.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: pass on, advance, abs., Ps 48:5 (Ol We pass away, perish), Mic 2:13 a (acc. loc.).
Pass away:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: emigrate, leave one's territory or city Mic 1:11.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: vanish, of chaff, Is 29:5 cf. Je 13:24, shadow Ps 144:4, b rooks Job 6:15 (all in sim.), Ct So 5:6.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: = cease to exist, perish Na 1:12, Job 30:15, Job 33:18 ([[בְּ]] instr.), Job 36:12 (id.), Job 34:20, Ps 37:36 (but rd. [[ואעבר]] and I passed by, cf.

definitions.title: 4 a
definitions.body: ), cf. Is 31:9 ([[סלעו]] subj.), [[מֵאֱלֽהַי מִשְׁפָּטִי יַעֲבוֹר]] Is 40:27 pass away from.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: = become invalid, obsolete, of law, decree, Es 1:19, Es 9:27, also v:Es 9:28 ( + [[מִתּוֹךְ]] [[הַיְהוּדִים]]).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: c. [[מִן]] of hands Ps 81:7 (i.e. they were freed from).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: = be alienated, pass into other hands Ez Eze 48:14 (rdg. Kt; > Qr

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: ).—Je 2:20 rd. [[אֶעֱבוֹד]] Kt (not [[אֶעֱבוֹר]] Qr); [[וׇאֶתֵּן לָהֶם]] [[יַעַבְרוּם]] Je 8:13 and I gave to them that which they transgress LXX Vulgate Targum Aq Symm Ew, those that shall pass over them Hi Gf Ke RVm, those that shall consume, devour them Rothst: Kau (rdg. [[יְבַעֲרוּם]]) but all very dub.; LXX Co del.; Je 11:15 rd. Hiph. q.v.; [[מִנּׁגַהּ נֶּגְדּוֹ עָבָיו עָֽבְרוּ]] Ps 18:13 is difficult; perhaps best, as Che Kit:Kau Löhr, out of the brightness before him issued forth hailstones, etc. (del. [[עָבָיו]]); > ‖ 2Sa 22:13 [[בָּֽעֲרוּ]] and so here Bu HPS cf. Woods:Hbr 1887, 262, his clouds burned with hailstones, etc.; rd. rather [[עברו]] in 2 S.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[נַחַל אֲשֶׁר לאׁ יֵעָבֵר]] Ez Eze 47:5 a stream which cannot be forded.

definitions.title: Pi. 1.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[שׁוֹרוֹ עִבַּר]] Job 21:10 his bull impregnateth (cf. NH) abs. (prop. causeth to pass over, sc. semen).
Impf. 3 ms. ´[[וַיְעַבֵּר בְּ]] 1Ki 6:21 he made to pass across with chains of gold.—

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: v. [[[עָבַר]]] infr.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הֶעֱבִיר]] 2Sa 12:13 +; 2 ms. [[הֵעֲבַ֫רְתָּ]] Jos 7:7 (Ges:§ 63 p), [[וְהַעֲבַרְתָּ֫]] Ez Eze 5:1 +; 1 S. [[הֶעֱבַ֫רְתִּי]] Zec 3:4, [[וְהַעֲבַרְתִּ֫י]] Ez Eze 20:37 + Je 15:14 (but rd. [[והעבדתי]] LXX SyrVer Targum Codd Ew Hi Gf Gie), etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיַּעֲבֵר]] Ge 8:1 +, [[וַיַּעֲבֶר־]] 2Ch 36:22 = Ezr 1:1, sf. [[וַיַּעֲבִרֵנִי]] Ez Eze 46:21 +, etc.; Imv. ms. [[הַעֲבֵר]] Ps 119:37 + 2 t., [[הַעֲבֶר־]] 2Sa 24:10 = 1Ch 21:8; mpl. sf. [[הַעֲבִירוּנִי]] 2Ch 35:23; Inf. abs. [[הַעֲבִיר]] Jos 7:7 (rd. prob. [[הַעֲבֵיר]]); cstr. [[הַעֲבִיר]] 2Sa 3:10 +, [[לַעֲבִיר]] 2Sa 19:19 (Ges:§ 53 q), etc.; Pt. [[מַעֲבִיר]] De 18:10, Da 11:20, pl. [[מַעֲבִרִים]] 1Sa 2:24 (v. infr.);—
cause to pass over, bring over:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: cause one to cross river, c. 2 acc., Ge 32:24 (J), Nu 32:5, Jos 7:7 (both JE), 2Sa 19:16, 2Sa 19:42; acc. of river om. Ge 32:24 (J), Jos 4:3, Jos 7:7 (+ Inf. abs,; both JE), Jos 4:8 (JE; + [[אֶל־]]), 2Sa 2:8 (+ acc. loc.).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: cause something to pass over ([[עַל־]]): razor (acc.) Nu 8:7 (P), cf. Ez Eze 5:1 (where Co rds. sf. of razor), wind Ge 8:1 (P).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: make over to ([[ל]]), acc. of inheritance Nu 27:7, Nu 27:8 (P); of making over, dedicating, something to ([[לְ]]) deity Ex 13:12 (JE; = [[קִדַּשׂ]]). Esp.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: devote children to ([[לְ]]) heathen god Je 32:35, Ez Eze 23:37 ( + [[לְאָכְלָה]]), Le 18:21 (H), cf. Ez Eze 16:21; + [[בָּאֵשׁ]] by fire 2Ki 23:10; c. acc. alone devote Ez Eze 20:26; c. acc. + [[בָּאֵשׁ]] alone, devote by fire De 18:10, 2Ki 16:3, 2Ki 17:7, 2Ki 21:6 = 2Ch 33:6, Ez Eze 20:31 (on the practice cf. Now:Arch. ii. 205 f. Benz: Arch. 483 f. Toy:Ez Eze 16:20, Eze 20:26 GFM: JBL xvi (1897), 161 ff.).

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: cause to pass through, c. acc. + [[בְּ]] Ez Eze 14:15, Eze 47:3, Eze 47:4 + v:Eze 47:4 (where ins. [[בְּ]], cf. Co Berthol Toy), Nu 31:23, Nu 31:23 (P); c. acc. + [[בְּתוֹח]] Ps 136:14; c. acc. pers. alone Ps 78:13, + [[אֶל־]] Ez Eze 46:21, + [[עַד־אֲשֶׁר]] Ne 2:7; c. acc. of (sound of) [[שׁוֹפָר]] Le 25:9 (H), + [[בְּ]] v:Le 25:9 (P); c. acc. [[קוֹל]] = proclamation, + [[בְּ]] Ex 36:6 (P), 2Ch 30:5, 2Ch 36:22 = Ezr 1:1, Ezr 10:7 ( + [[לִ]] pers.), Ne 8:15.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: let pass through, c. acc. + [[בְּ]] pers. De 2:30.

definitions.title: 3. a.
definitions.body: cause to pass by, c. acc. + [[עַל־]], Ez Eze 37:2 (+ [[סָבִיב סָבִיב]]), + [[עַל־פְּנֵי]] Ex 33:19 (J), + [[לִפְנֵי]] 1Sa 16:8, 1Sa 16:10 and ([[לִפְנֵי]] om.) v:1Sa 16:9.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: let pass by, c. acc. [[מוֹעֵד]] Je 46:17 he hath let the set time pass by (in mocking appell. of Pharaoh).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: cause arrow to pass beyond one 1Sa 20:36.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: cause to pass under rod, for counting, Ez Eze 20:37 (cf.

Cause to pass away, take away, kingdom (acc.) + [[מִן]] pers. 2Sa 3:10, cf. Es 8:2, + [[מֵעַל]] Jon 3:6 (of putting off garment); c. acc. of sin 2Sa 12:13, 2Sa 24:20 = 1Ch 21:8, Job 7:21, + [[מֵעַל]] pers. Zec 3:4, Je 11:15 (rdg. [[יַעֲבִרוּ מֵעַל]] Ew Gf Gie); put away evil things (acc.) from ([[מִן]]), 1Ki 15:12 cf. ‖ 2Ch 15:8, Zec 13:2, Ec 11:10; c. acc. alone Ps 119:39, Es 8:3; also take me away (sf.) 2Ch 35:23 (c. [[מִן]]) v:2Ch 35:24; turn away eyes (acc.) + [[מִן]] Ps 119:37.—Ge 47:21 rd. [[הֶעֱבִיד לַעֲבָדִים]] Sam LXX Vulgate Ol Kn Di Kau Holz; Je 15:14 rd. [[וְהַעֲבַדְתִּיְ]] LXX Targum Codd Gie; 2Sa 12:31 rd. [[וְהֶעֱבִיד]] Hoffm:ZAW ii (1882), 53 f. Gr Klo Bu Kit HPS, cf. Dr Löhr; 2Sa 19:41 (for [[ויעברו]] Kt, [[הֶעֱבִרוּ]] Qr) rd. [[עׂבְרִים]] LXX We Bu Löhr HPS, [[וַיַּעַבְרוּ]] Kit (v.

definitions.body: ); Ez Eze 48:14 rd.

definitions.body: (so Kt; v.

definitions.title: Qal 6 e
definitions.body: ); ´[[מַעֲבִרִים עַם־י]] 1Sa 2:24 not good is the report which I hear the people of ´[[י]] spreading (cf.

), so Ew Th We Dr Kit Löhr RVm, but order of words difficult; > (ye) make the people of ´[[י]] transgress Vulgate AV RV; text dub.; [[נוֹגֵשׂ מַעֲבִיר]] Da 11:20 one causing an exactor to pass through Ew al. RV, Bev prop. ´[[נוֹגֵשׂ מ]] an exactor causing to pass away the glory, etc.
